comment._content: Is this image protected by Crown copyright?

comment.author: 31575009@N05
comment._content: Yes. But we have made this instance of it available for any non-commercial use.

comment.author: 79962317@N00
comment._content: It says in the metadata for this image: "License: No known copyright restrictions". If you're going to add a non-commercial restriction then you should remove the image from flickr commons. Also, this image has been uploaded to Wikimedia Commons: commons.wikimedia.org/wiki/File:Royal_Air_Force_Recruitme...
